creditline: The Mary Ruth Weisel Endowment for Africa, Oceania, and the Americas and gift of Robert T. Coffland in memory of Mary Hunt Kahlenberg
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: rectangular panel; golden brown with dark brown designs; long thin scrolling lines and parallel lines joined with a center band--some with looping C shapes at either side
inscription: on back at one corner and at center in black ink: TTO
title: Barkcloth panel
